mapper.select: SELECT MONEY , MCOUNT FROM WLCHECK WHERE RTTYPE=#{rtType} AND RTTIME = (SELECT MAX(RTTIME) FROM WLCHECK WHERE RTTYPE=#{rtType})
SELECT WL_SPECIALNOTE FROM WL WHERE WL_TIME = (SELECT MAX(WL_TIME) FROM WL)
SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR((RT_TIME),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AS MAXTIME FROM RT WHERE RT_SIASHCODE=#{shCode}

SELECT SIA_SHCODE AS SHCODE, SH_NAME AS SHNAME, SH_TYPE AS SHTYPE, SIA_ABCODE AS ABCODE, AB_NAME AS ABNAME, SC_STARTTIME AS STARTTIME, SC_ENDTIME AS ENDTIME FROM SIA INNER JOIN SH ON SIA_SHCODE = SH_CODE INNER JOIN AB ON SIA_ABCODE = AB_CODE INNER JOIN SC ON SIA_ABCODE = SC_SIAABCODE AND SIA_SHCODE = SC_SIASHCODE WHERE SIA_ABCODE = #{abCode}
